HOME.TITLE: Liquors of the World
HOME.WELCOME_TEXT: Get ready to showcase your mastery of the world's spirits in an epic quiz, where only the savviest liquor aficionados will manage to claim victory...

SCOREBOARD.STATUS_OVER: The quiz is over. All {{questionsCount}} questions have been answered. Here are the final results:
SCOREBOARD.STATUS_NOT_OVER: So far, {{questionsAnsweredCount}} out of {{questionsCount}} questions have been answered. Here are the current results:

START_QUIZ.TITLE: Start the quiz
START_QUIZ.TEXT: Are you ready to start the quiz? New players won't be able to join afterwards!
START_QUIZ.SINGLE_PLAYER_WAITING: There is currently 1 player waiting to play.
START_QUIZ.MANY_PLAYERS_WAITING: There are currently {{count}} players waiting to play.

ANSWER.WAIT_FOR_PLAYERS: Please wait for all players to answer the question...
ANSWER.CURRENT_STATUS: So far, {{voteCount}} out of {{playersCount}} players have voted.

ERRORS.INVALID_LANGUAGE: This quiz ID language option is invalid.
ERRORS.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: This user already exists: choose another username.
ERRORS.USER_NOT_PART_OF_QUIZ: This user is not part of the quiz and the latter has already started.
ERRORS.USER_CANNOT_START_QUIZ: This user does not have the rights to start a quiz.
ERRORS.USER_CANNOT_START_QUESTION: This user does not have the rights to start a question.
ERRORS.CANNOT_START_UNSUPERVISED_QUESTION: This quiz is unsupervised. Its questions cannot be started.
ERRORS.CURRENT_QUESTION_INCOMPLETE: The current question has not been answered by all players.
ERRORS.COULD_NOT_FETCH_DATA: Something went wrong when trying to fetch data from the server.
ERRORS.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An internal error occurred on the server.
ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED: You are not authorized to do that.
